website_summaries.verdict: A good performing mini-split that cools a nice size area, but installation can be difficult.
pros: Kit comes with all of the materials you need for installation
Energy efficient with an inverter system to help keep your electric bill low
LED temperature display on the wall air handler
Rated to cool rooms up to about 900 sq
cons: While this unit is advertised DIY, it's best to have a final inspection by a licensed HVAC before use

customer_reviews.title: Great product all around!
customer_reviews.text: Great product all around. Bought this unit for a tenant when the old floor furnace broke. Instead of trying to fix that antique we opted for a fresh look and the option of heating and cooling. Tenants have already thanked us and love the unit. Parts arrived quickly and free of any damage. Units were easy to install and even the licensed HVAC company I hired to check the system out were pleasantly surprised with how easy it was to do the hook ups and check outs.
customer_reviews.author: KaiNook

customer_reviews.title: great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Was shipped and received on time and undamaged. I had a licensed HVAC friend install. The installation went smooth, except for a disconnected wire to the remote control unit. Just so you all know.. if the inside unit led display doesn't light up.. just unscrew the screw on the remote unit.. plug the loose wire in and its good to go!! Been running two days.. keeps the temp in the workshop at a constant 70 degrees.. It is beyond quiet.. I had to go to the back of the work shop to see if it was even running, cause you can not hear it!! I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Installation was very easy, and let me install without cutting through the concrete.
customer_reviews.text: I have over 32 feet of exposed glass, and the AC is keeping my barn cool. Most of the time I can't even here if the unit is on, it is so quiet. Definitely buy the heat function, I wasn't but am glad I did , as it is being used with the Winter cold. I would definitely recommend Ductless Aire for a Barn.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple install for typical do it yourselfer.
customer_reviews.text: Just got done hooking it up, works excellent, you will need the use of a HVAC gauge set and vacuum pump plus a 5/16 female to 1/4" adapter to draw down the system but those were the only specialty tools. Unit is very quiet, after install I gave it a test run and cooled a 14'x14'room with an11' vaulted ceiling from 83° to 74° in twenty minutes My only advice is to make sure to include a phone number when ordering so the final shipping company can contact you, mine was delayed almost a week because of this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Deal
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ductless air 24,000BTU unit about a month ago and installed it in less than three hours (with a help of a friend) and i tell you this unit is so powerful and so quiet that many times I think it is off when it is working, it is a very good unit and I honestly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kamel Khuja

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Probably requires additional additional accessories and service(s): a bargain nonetheless.
customer_reviews.text: This product works great!. Relatively easy install if you are handy, but be aware you will require the services of an HVAC contractor to make the final hookups and test. Also be aware there are some additional items you may require such as a mounting bracket for the heat pump and line covers. Technical support is great and the product is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Wees

customer_reviews.title: Great unit
customer_reviews.text: We are so happy with our purchase! We had professionally installed and it works great!! We couldn’t be happier with our purchase!! Highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Callahan

customer_reviews.title: This unit is quiet inside and out and does a great job cooling.
customer_reviews.text: Ductless Aire is a nice looking unit inside and out, it does a great job of cooling and reducing relative humidity. I hired a professional company to install it, they did not have any complaints, and it was a smooth procedure. The reason I bought this 18,000 Btu rather than a 12,000 Btu unit for aproximately 500 square feet area, was because of the 18 foot high point of the ceiling, 10 Windows, and the Florida heat. The price made it easy to upgrade from the 12,000 Btu to the 18,000 Btu. We are very satisfied with this purchase. The remote has a lot of features for the users.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S. Internicola

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This air conditioner is a great value and was it someone easy to install. Install time was about three hours. Overall the product has surpassed my expectation and is cooling a 950 square foot room.
customer_reviews.author: Eric H.

customer_reviews.title: Great unit!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Delivery was fast and the driver was courteous. Installation was easy and done by our usual HVAC company. It took them about to hours to set up. Works as advertised!
customer_reviews.author: idesign_2

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be well worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This unit works great when cooling my house, I hope it works as good when heating for fall and spring. it is well built, and when i checked my electric usage my usage dropped from the 8000 btu window I was using, it is also so very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: R A R

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be well engineered.  Ask me again in a year or so.
customer_reviews.text: Living in central florida gives us the opportunity to heat and cool our residence. So far, 9 days, it is great. Quiet and efficient. If this works out, we will add another for our bedroon. We live in a senior mobile home park 6 mos of the year.

customer_reviews.title: but all worked great. Cools great
customer_reviews.text: Mounted and using in my RV. Minor mods for the lines to the outside, but all worked great. Cools great!. Heat put out is minimal but keeps the chill out. RV has some insulation issues though. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: texasbbj

customer_reviews.title: Good product, straight forward to install and super quiet
customer_reviews.text: Did the DYI install, pretty straight forward with some help from youtube, super quiet. The AC cranks but haven't had a chance to really try the heat on a cold day. Great value and would buy again for sure.

customer_reviews.title: Heater setting blowing cool air
customer_reviews.text: Had it installed heated good the first day... During a cold patch in weather started blowing cool air instead... Very disappointed!

customer_reviews.title: Best Way to Cool Your House
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. I have a 1400 sq. ft. House and I mounted this in our living room for those really hot summer days. This unit cools my house in about 20 minutes. The unit is fairly easy to install. Most people will need an electrician for power to the condenser and an HVAC guy to pump down the system and release the coolant. Great thing is it has a heat pump as well, so this winter we used this, and it heats my house in 15 minutes. Economical to run. Easy to use remote and super quiet. I would defiantly buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Tisha Dore

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality. The factory was very accommodating and shipped ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. The factory was very accommodating and shipped it ASAP when I requested on the early side of shipment estimate - actually arrived one day early. Everything you need for the install is included except the pad the outside unit will rest on and the line set cover (I use a vinyl gutter from Loew's). The install is easy if you have any experience working with basic carpentry and plumbing tools. If not I wouldn't attempt it without guidance. I installed within 3 hours and our local HVAC guy tested the pressure, vacuum and released the refrigerant within a 1 1/2 hour visit. Quiet and easy operation - heats our downstairs 700 sqft space easily. Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have had nothing but problems with this unit and Customer Support has been non-existent. We have been unable to get any replacement parts and have contacted the manufacturer numerous times with no response. From leaks to bad design features and now the indoor unit is breaking apart and falling off the wall. Stay away from this manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's cooling great these hot summer days in Tennessee
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for our garage apartment. This has been an answer to a prayer. It's cooling great these hot summer days in Tennessee, and am looking forward to it doing a good job heating this winter. Sleek, nice looking unit. Installation went easy with no problems. Hoping for years of great service!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Love the Units
customer_reviews.text: Love the Units. Great for zoning your house. don't need the same temps in all the rooms. the Split Air units are the best.. Low cost: LOW Sound both the inside unit and the outside pump unit.......Not loud at all..
customer_reviews.author: HDiceblue

customer_reviews.title: extremely efficent and cost effective way to cool and heat
customer_reviews.text: extremely efficent and cost effective way to cool and heat. the people at the company took very good care of us when the trucking company madden error in shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What's not to like?
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for winters in South Texas, where it does sometimes get cold enough to need a heater; it is perfect. As other reviewers have said, the unit is quiet, efficient, and kept us warm in a big, drafty house. My energy bill was cut in half in December-January. Unobtrusive because it's installed near the ceiling, and the remote seals the deal. I will never get another whole-house HVAC again, mini-splits are the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Feline Staff

customer_reviews.title: This unit is a must buy
customer_reviews.text: I dont know yet about the energy efficiency until my bill comes, but the units heating is excellent , and it was easy to install,the company that sells this is great on customer service ,very responsive i would recomend this unit , ihave other units in my house but this one works better than the other brands, this unit is a big yes
customer_reviews.author: earl wackerly

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with its operational capacity
customer_reviews.text: Although I did not purchase this Frikko mini-split from Amazon but through a dealer here in Mexico, I am very pleased with its operational capacity. We have used it for approx. 6 mos. now and have found it to be amazing in its ability to cool. The Winter months will be coming soon and I am most anxious to see how it performs in taking the chill off here at the beach in a home that is built essentially of cinder block. We are right on the ocean and have found the last couple years incredibly chilly at night during January through March. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn

customer_reviews.title: Great Unit !!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this unit October 2018. We have been using now for that amount of time. Our old unit went out and we had to replace. We did research and found this unit to have the best reviews for the price. We are very happy with the unit. The remote is much easier to use than our last unit. It puts out cold air and heat very well. It takes no time at all to heat or cool our small home. I'm happy we bought the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased! It has done wonderfully in surprisingly cold temperatures ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use for my training room and I must say, so far, I'm very pleased! It has done wonderfully in surprisingly cold temperatures here in TN, and now that it is starting to get warmer and I've had to switch, it does excellent there too! I usually just use portable heating units, then a portable (or window, ugh!) AC unit but decided to take the plunge. I am SO glad I did - this was the perfect choice and now I have a bit more space, too! Wonderful choice, my electric bill was less than with the portable units, too!
customer_reviews.author: Grace Vagary

customer_reviews.title: Cant be beat
customer_reviews.text: Why would anyone even consider a different brand??? Amazing value for a reliable product. Customer service can't be matched and the shipping is unbelievable fast!!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbieg

customer_reviews.title: Awesome system, great value... We can now use our basement comfortably!
customer_reviews.text: Ductless aire makes a great product. We have this unit installed in our basement. The installation was very fast and easy. We can now use our basement comfortably any time we want. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: M Harris

customer_reviews.title: Straightforward install.  Very nice unit.
customer_reviews.text: Finished the installation about a month ago. Installation was as expected and straightforward. So far it is very quiet and working great. I will have to see if the electrical savings pan out. I watched a couple of youtube videos on purging the system with nitrogen and vacuuming the lines. I think this is a critical step.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Working well now for 3 years
customer_reviews.text: I got ours from HD, and am very happy with them. Very quiet, the seer is among the highest (ours is 22) and if you have a question, the company is US based.
